PatientDetails.Name: Marjorie R. Ellis
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 10/01/2024 from Holzer with altered mental status.
Diagnosed with sepsis secondary to multi-drug resistant urinary tract infection and hospital-acquired pneumonia.
Course complicated by persistent acute multifactorial metabolic encephalopathy, volume overload, malnutrition, and acute respiratory failure.
Patient transitioned to DNR-CC and expired on 10/13/2024.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Expired on 10/13/2024 due to complications related to sepsis and acute respiratory failure.

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Patient met criteria for sepsis with elevated lactate, altered mental status, and significant co-morbidities contributing to decline.

BloodProducts.HemoglobinLevels: Had hemoglobin levels as low as 6.2
BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: No blood transfusions documented during this hospitalization.
